attributes.action: M.P.s should set an example by cutting their own very high salaries by at least 5% and their expense entitlements by at least 10%
attributes.additional_details: In the light of the governments repeated insistence that we are all in the current financial mess together it is only right and fair that M.P.s set an example by cutting their own very high salaries by at least 5% and their generous expense entitlements by at least 10%
